GameWorld Class Reference

The class that creates the world an encompasses all base game entities. More...

#include <GameWorld.h>

Detailed Description

The class that creates the world an encompasses all base game entities.

Author:
Will Herbert
Version:
1.0
Date:
Last revision 10/05/2015 Updated to comply with doxygen and NCCA coding standard

Definition at line 29 of file GameWorld.h.

void GameWorld::Update ( double  _timeElapsed,
double  _currentTime 
)

updates all of the entities in the world, the cells in the cell graph and checks for change in state

Parameters:
[in] _timeElapsed the time elapsed since last tick

00299   }
00300 
00301   // check for win/lose states
00302   if(m_numberOfRiotersHome >= m_numberOfRiotersHomeToWin)
00303   {
00304     m_win = 1;
00305   }
00306   if(m_numberOfRiotersDead >= m_numberOfRiotersDeadToLose)
00307   {
00308     m_lose = 1;
00309   }
00310   if(m_availablePolice <= 0 && m_activePolice <= 0)
00311   {
00312     m_lose = 1;
00313   }
00314 }
